articles.title: South African ambassador 'no longer welcome' in US, Rubio says - BBC.com
articles.description: The US Secretary of State called the ambassador a "race-baiting politician who hates America".
articles.content:
Rachel Looker
The US is expelling South Africa's ambassador to Washington, with Secretary of State Marco Rubio saying he is "no longer welcome in our great country".
In a post on X, Rubio accused A… [+2828 chars]
